description: Manual game result overrides for testing scoring with real ESPN games

howToGetGameIds.1: Visit your app's /api/games endpoint to see all games with their IDs
howToGetGameIds.3: Game IDs are in the 'id' field of each event (e.g., '401234567')

usage.2_add_overrides: Add game overrides using real ESPN game IDs as keys
usage.3_format: scoreA = away team (first in game name), scoreB = home team (second)
usage.4_status: Use 'final' for completed games, 'in_progress' for live, 'scheduled' for upcoming
